post.body: A journey of a thousand miles starts with one step!
Love that quote!
Supporting IE6, Sadly yes and I cringe every time I do it! Can't we just blow IE up?!?!?!
OOO....l did you OD on sugar today?
Hey...thanks for the follow...I love your name, really cool :)
Thanks for the follow! Nice quotes on your Twitter page... and cool background :)
Never used Chrome but love Firefox. I just use IE to check the sites I'm building.
@brharrison For myself, when it's raining I like to go out and dance in it! And hey - It's also a free car wash :)
Dreams are that which, when you keep believing in them, become reality.
Babies are funny that way :/ Better out than in though!

Wow you're lucky to go to such fun places!
conviction is another good word. When you own it - it becomes yours.
Thanks for the follow...I'm honored :)

Yum!!!! YOu're so lucky!!!
